HOME.TITLE: We are Ajanta Gold
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Our association is occupied with handling, exchanging and wholesaling of a complete line of Industrial Chemicals. We figure out and process chemicals with high quality ingredients and compounds.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Our Creative Proccess
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION1: Established in the year 2018, we “Shree Laxman chemicals”, an ISO guaranteed accomplished the wonderful status of manufacturer, exporter and distributor of Industrial Chemicals.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: The chemicals we are using having high quality and have longer time frame of realistic usability. We delivered least harmful chemical compounds to the customers in chemical industries.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Products
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Following products are available in various variants. For example Scent, Size.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD BLACK PHENYLE
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: AJANTA GOLD BLACK PHENYLE kills all germs including bacteria, virus, and fungi. Powerful formulation which disinfects the floor and makes it safe

PRODUCT.TITLE: LAXMI GOLD HYDROCHLORIC(HCL)
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: AJANTA GOLD LAXMI GOLD HYDROCHLORIC(HCL) Disinfectant Toilet Cleaner. Kills 99.9% of germs Removes 10 x more yellowish.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD HAND WASH
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: AJANTA GOLD Hand Wash makes hand washing quicker and more effective than ever before! AJANTA GOLD Hand Wash gives 99.9% germ protection.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD DISH WASH
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: AJANTA GOLD Dish Wash is a quality product from Shree laxman chemicals.AJANTA GOLD Dish Wash is the original hand dishwashing brand.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD NAPHTHALENE BALLS
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Multicoloured napthalene balls is used as an insecticide and pest repellent. It can be used for toilet and wardrobe.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD COMPHOR TABLET
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Pure Camphor Tablet for daily aarti in your puja. According to Hindu Sashtra camphor is essential for building divine connection with your deity.
